last_episode_to_air.name: Life Must Go On
last_episode_to_air.overview: For Seol-woo, it's finally time for revenge. For all involved, it's finally time for closure and for punishments to be given where they are due.

name: Man to Man
overview: From Kim Won Seok, the writer of Descendants of the Sun, a drama about a special bodyguard with a background in special investigations and the Hallyu star he is supposed to protect.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: In need of a bodyguard, a longtime celeb hires a secret agent. Together, they solve crimes, fight the bad guys and get tangled up in a love triangle.

episodes.name: Ghost Agent K
episodes.overview: We meet Kim Seol-woo during a hostage situation, where he takes out the hostage takers against orders. He's recruited by the NIS to become a ghost agent: deeply planted into organizations, fake identities and operating discreetly.

episodes.name: Working for Un Gwang
episodes.overview: Neither Woon-Gwang nor his chief celeb manager Cha Do-Ha likes his new bodyguard. If the can't make him leave, they'll just make him want to leave.

episodes.name: Visiting Chairman Victor
episodes.overview: After leavening that Woon-Gwang has been involved in a similar accident before, Seol-Woo relays his suspicions to Lee Dong-Hyun, his comrade and mentor.

episodes.name: Did You Think I Liked You?
episodes.overview: From Chairman Victor's private collection of precious cultural artefacts, a wood carving catches Seol-Woo's eye. Then the power suddenly goes out.

episodes.name: Go with Your Feelings
episodes.overview: For his next task, Seol-woo must get close to Do-ha, but it isn't so easy when she has forbidden him to approach her within a 1-meter radius

episodes.name: Goldfinger Is Back
episodes.overview: Seol-woo gets drunk and sends cute text messages, all in the name of his mission. Meanwhile, Congressman Baek tries to make a deal with Jang Tae-ho.

episodes.name: From This Moment, I Resign
episodes.overview: To stop Seol-woo from blowing his cover, Dong-hyun tells him to stay out of the investigation. However, Seol-woo continues his search for the culprit.

episodes.name: Being a Bodyguard Was a Disguise
episodes.overview: Do-ha asks to hear the truth directly from Seol-woo. Meanwhile, Dong-hyun and Seol-woo begin preparation for their next mission, the Black Auction.

episodes.name: The Black Auction Mission
episodes.overview: For the country and Do-ha's father, Un-kwang decides to help Seol-woo. Do-ha, not able to trust Seol-woo, requires him to sign a contract.

episodes.name: An Agent's Tactic
episodes.overview: Jang Tae-ho lays down his conditions to Mo Seung-jae. For their new mission to commence, Seol-woo and Do-ha must first get the approval of Un-kwang.

episodes.name: Finding the Mole
episodes.overview: Seol-woo doesn't pick up Do-ha's phone calls, so she decides to check his workroom. Dong-hyun visits Jang Tae-ho and asks if he knows where K is.

episodes.name: The Path
episodes.overview: All sides involved, including Lee Dong-hyun, Mo Seung-jae and the National Intelligence Service, are continuing the search for the missing videotapes.

episodes.name: A Message From "Y"
episodes.overview: Jang Tae-ho and Lee Dong-hyun discuss Song Mi-eun and her past: She decided to marry Mo Seung-jae, not for his wealth but for her own survival.

episodes.name: Lovers Tactic
episodes.overview: The police find the vehicle involved in the hit-and-run accident. Determined to kill off the bad guys, Seol-woo gets his gun from his workroom.

episodes.name: Only the Truth Can Save You
episodes.overview: For Seol-woo, it's finally time for revenge. For all involved, it's finally time for closure and for punishments to be given where they are due.

episodes.name: Life Must Go On
episodes.overview: For Seol-woo, it's finally time for revenge. For all involved, it's finally time for closure and for punishments to be given where they are due.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: In need of a bodyguard, a longtime celeb hires a secret agent. Together, they solve crimes, fight the bad guys and get tangled up in a love triangle.
